abstract: The deal is a sign of the staying power of Apple’s mobile devices as game machines, analysts said.
snippet: The deal is a sign of the staying power of Apple’s mobile devices as game machines, analysts said.
lead_paragraph: The Walt Disney Company said on Thursday that it had bought Tapulous, a start-up company that makes music-based games for the iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch.

headline.main: Disney Buys Tapulous, Maker of Music Game Applications
headline.print_headline: Disney Buys Tapulous, Maker Of Music Game Applications
